comments.content:
The two Rr make a perfect stereopair. One sees a complex 3D pattern when they are visually fused. The reason for that are the slight horizontal shifts in the outlines. In the old days I used Letraset transfer sheets to achieve such effects!

[www.ne.jp/asahi/tamari/vladimir/3dd.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312052643/http:/www.ne.jp/asahi/tamari/vladimir/3dd.html "www.ne.jp/asahi/tamari/vladimir/3dd.html")
